author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR copies `edmRtnupleStorage` from the `RNTUPLE_X` branch, and renames it to `edmRNTupleTempStorage` for consistency with other utilities in the `FWIO/RNTupleTempInput` package. The PR also adds `edmRNTupleTempCompareFieldSizes.py` script, that uses the `edmRNTupleTempStorage` utility, that compares field-by-field their storage sizes in two RNTuple files. I used to tune the set of fields to disable splitting.

The original `edmRtnupleStorage` was developed within these PRs
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47402
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47718
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47902

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1632

#### PR validation:

The `edmRNTupleTempCompareFieldSizes.py` script technically runs when given two RNTuple files.
title: Add two RNTuple utilities
